title: Klarna reports Q4 revenue up 38% YoY to $1.08B and a $26M net loss, down from a $40M profit in Q4 2024; KLAR is down 50%+ since its September 2025 NYSE IPO (Laith Al-Khalaf/Financial Times)
tags: Financial Times;Klarna reports Q4 revenue up 38% YoY to $1.08B and a $26M net loss, down from a $40M profit in Q4 2024; KLAR is down 50%+ since its September 2025 NYSE IPO
